question: The mangrove cover along the east coast of India is more than that of the west coast for which of the following reasons?
option2: Presence of gradual slope along eastern coast
option3: Bay of Bengal is more salinity than Arabian sea
answer: Presence of gradual slope along eastern coast
explanation: The mangrove cover along the east coast of India is more than that of the west coast because of the presence of gradual slope along the eastern coast.
